title: APEM launches Dual Icon series of LED indicators
description:
APEM's Dual Icon indicators use green and red filters combined with vivid LED lighting to produce a 120° viewing angle.

The post APEM launches Dual Icon series of LED indicators appeared first on The Robot Report.
